episode.creator: This Week in DAOS
episode.title: This Week in DAOs #006
episode.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
episode.content:
Nadia is a facilitator of the Growth Core Unit at MakerDAO, where her team focuses on business partnerships and integrations of $DAI.

We talked about:
Typical day for a DAO worker, differences between working at DAO and working at traditional corp, difficulties of working at DAO rn.

Follow Nadia on Twitter (@nad8802)
Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
